queries: How much does a standard bike tune-up cost?
How much do you charge for standard bike tune-up
responses: A standard bike tune-up typically starts at $50, but the final cost can vary depending on the specific services your bike needs.

queries: Can I schedule a bike service appointment online?
Do you offer online appointment for bike service?
Can I book an online appointment?
responses: Yes, you can easily schedule a bike service appointment online through our website.

queries: What services are included in a basic bike tune-up?
What services are included in a basic bike tuning?
responses: A basic bike tune-up usually includes a safety check, chain lubrication, brake adjustment, and tire inflation.

queries: How often should I get my bike serviced?
responses: We recommend getting your bike serviced at least once a year for regular maintenance. However, it may need more frequent service depending on your usage.

queries: Do you provide bike pickup and delivery service?
responses: Yes, we offer pickup and delivery services for bike repairs. Please contact us to schedule this service.

queries: Can I get a discount for multiple bike services?
Do you offer discount for more than one bikes?
Do you offer discount for multiple bikes?
responses: We offer discounts for multiple bike services. Feel free to ask about our current promotions.

queries: What should I do if my bike has a flat tire?
responses: If you have a flat tire, you can bring your bike in for a quick tire repair or replacement.

queries: Do you refund payment if I cancel the appointment?
Can I get my payment back if I cancel the appointment?
responses: Yes, we refund payment if appointment is cancelled

queries: What if the repairing work is not satisfactory?
Do you take responsibilty if the repair work is not good or satisfactory?
responses: We will again check your bike and will fix the issues free of charges if the repairing is not done well.

queries: How long does a bike tune-up usually take?
How much time bike tune-up may take?
responses: A standard bike tune-up typically takes 1 to 2 business days, but the time may vary based on the services required.

queries: Do you sell bike accessories and parts?
responses: Yes, we have a wide range of bike accessories and parts available for purchase in our shop.

queries: Can I cancel or reschedule my bike service appointment?
responses: es, you can cancel or reschedule your appointment by contacting us at least 24 hours in advance.

queries: What types of bike brands do you service?
responses: We provide service for a variety of bike brands, including major brands and boutique manufacturers.

queries: Do you offer warranties on your bike repairs?
responses: Yes, we offer warranties on our bike repairs. The duration of the warranty may vary depending on the service performed.

queries: How can I check the availability for a bike service appointment?
How to know if appointment is available or not?
responses: You can check appointment availability on our website or by giving us a call during business hours.

queries: What is the turnaround time for a bike repair?
responses: The turnaround time for a bike repair depends on the complexity of the repair. We'll provide you with an estimate when you drop off your bike.

queries: Can I get a custom bike built at your shop?
responses: Yes, we offer custom bike building services. Contact us to discuss your requirements.

queries: Do you provide bike maintenance tips or workshops?
responses: Yes, we offer bike maintenance workshops and can provide you with tips to keep your bike in great condition.

queries: Is it possible to get a loaner bike while mine is being serviced?
Can I get a bike on loan if my bike is being serviced?
responses: We do offer loaner bikes, but availability may be limited. Please inquire when scheduling your appointment.

queries: Can you provide an estimate for my bike repair before I bring it in?
Do you provide an estimate before bringing bike for repair?
responses: Yes, we can provide a rough estimate over the phone, but a more accurate estimate will be given after our technicians inspect your bike.

queries: What are your operating hours?
What are your working hours?
responses: Our operating hours are 08:00 AM to 10:00 PM. Please note that these hours may vary on holidays and special occasions.

queries: What types of bike maintenance services do you offer?
what type of bike repair services do you offer?
responses: We offer a wide range of bike maintenance services, including tune-ups, tire repairs, brake adjustments, gear tuning, and more.

queries: Can I track the progress of my bike repair online?
responses: Yes, you can track the status of your bike repair on our website by entering your service order number.

queries: Do you provide services for electric bikes (e-bikes)?
do you offer services for electric bikes?
responses: Yes, we have expertise in servicing electric bikes, including battery diagnostics and motor maintenance.

queries: What is included in a comprehensive bike inspection?
responses: A comprehensive bike inspection includes a thorough check of all components, ensuring your bike is in optimal condition.

queries: How can I contact your bike service shop for inquiries?
How can I contact for bike service?
How to contact you?
responses: You can reach us by phone at [1234567] or send us an email at [bike_service@gmail.com].

queries: Can I book a same-day bike service appointment?
responses: Same-day appointments are subject to availability. Please contact us to check if we have an opening.

queries: Do you offer discounts for students or seniors?
responses: Yes, we offer discounts for students and seniors. Please bring valid identification to avail of these discounts.

queries: What is the recommended maintenance schedule for a mountain bike?
How often should I schedule maintenance for the bike?
responses: The recommended maintenance schedule for a mountain bike varies based on usage. We suggest regular check-ups every 3 to 6 months.

queries: Can I purchase gift cards for bike services?
responses: Yes, we offer gift cards that can be used for bike services. They make great gifts for fellow cyclists.

queries: Do you provide emergency bike repairs?
Do you provide emergency services?
responses: In case of emergency, we do our best to accommodate urgent bike repairs. Call us for assistance.

queries: Can I upgrade specific bike components during a tune-up?
responses: Yes, you can discuss component upgrades with our technicians during your bike tune-up appointment.

queries: Are your bike mechanics certified and experienced?
responses: Yes, our bike mechanics are certified and have extensive experience in bike servicing.

queries: Do you offer bike rentals for tourists or visitors?
responses: We do offer bike rentals for tourists. Explore our rental options on our website.

queries: What forms of payment do you accept for bike services?
responses: We accept cash, credit cards, and mobile payment methods for bike services.

queries: Can you recommend a bike lock for security?
responses: We recommend high-quality bike locks to ensure the security of your bike. Ask us for product recommendations.

queries: Do you provide winterizing services for bikes?
responses: Yes, we offer winterizing services to protect your bike during the colder months.

queries: What should I do if I encounter a bike-related problem while on the road?
responses: In case of a bike breakdown, contact us for guidance, and we'll do our best to assist you.

queries: Can I get a service package for my entire bike fleet?
responses: Yes, we offer service packages for businesses and organizations with multiple bikes. Contact us to discuss your needs.

queries: Do you sell refurbished bikes or used bike parts?
responses: We occasionally have refurbished bikes and used bike parts available for sale. Check our shop for current inventory.

queries: How do I properly store my bike during long periods of non-use?
responses: Properly store your bike by cleaning it, lubricating the chain, and storing it indoors to protect it from the elements.
